roleset.name: establish, setting up
roleset.note: ESTABLISH-V NOTES: Based on financial subcorpus. Comparison with 'set'. Member of Vncls establish-55.5-1, base-97.1, indicate-78-1-1. (from establish.01-v)
ESTABLISHMENT-N NOTES: Added by Julia based on establish-v.01. Corresponds to Vncls establish-55.5-1, base-97.1, indicate-78-1-1. (from establishment.01-n)

example.name: just transitive
example.text: ``He's in a vulnerable position because he hasn't established much credibility on his own,'' says Bryan Jacoboski.

example.name: with attribute
example.text: Jay Freedman said P& G's Always sanitary napkin, sold under the Whisper name in Japan, has firmly established itself as a leading brand.
example.arg: P& G's Always sanitary napkin, sold under the Whisper name in Japan,

example.name: with benefactive
example.text: During the third quarter, the company established a $30 million reserve for its high-yield bond portfolio.

example.name: with arg0
example.text: the formal establishment between our two countries

example.name: with arg1
example.text: The establishment of its first bureau in Warsaw Pact territory
example.arg: of its first bureau in Warsaw Pact territory

example.name: args 0 & 1 with LOC
example.text: the establishment of " refugee camps " at Guantanamo by the US

example.name: lots of args
example.text: his establishment of a home for twenty of these waifs in a Naples convent

example.name: args 1 & 2
example.text: his establishment as the president of University of Tehran
example.arg: as the president of University of Tehran

example.name: NOT EVENTIVE! .YY!
example.text: Or , they could be the opposite of independent thinkers and accept the propaganda spouted by the establishment .
